modName: NEW LOOK LYDIA MARRIABLE ESSENTIAL OR MORTAL
descriptionHtml:
Well i don\'t think Lydia is ugly,but i like to change the things,i tried to keep her essence and make her more beautiful,so i made this.
Now you can marry her,you can download the essential version(she can\'t die) or the Mortal version(she can die)
She is using the imperial armor,shield and sword.
Max lvl is 90 i think is more interesting than 50 doesn\'t it?

=========
Required Files:
=========

SKYRIM 1.6.89.0.6
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachi Hair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url]

=====
Optional:
=====

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2464]Bright Eyes[/url]
author: Waldoman
